1.15.2.2.2: Fix broken searchbox, and crash when clearing the crafting grid.

1.14.2.2.2: Fix broken searchbox, and crash when clearing the crafting grid.

1.11.2.2.1.4: Added missing recipe for Automation Driver.

1.11.2.1.0: Compatibility with 'The One Probe' and other fixes.
1.11.2.1.2: Fix a few huge bugs that somehow slipped through my testing.

1.10.2.1.5.0: SHINY NEW: A whole lot of refactorings and new features. See the website for more information.
1.10.2.2.0.0: Big revamp of the energy cost.
1.10.2.2.1.3: Backport most of the functional changes from 1.11.
1.10.2.2.1.4: Added missing recipe for Automation Driver.

1.10.1.0.0: Tesla API compatibility. Fix generators consuming buckets.
1.10.1.0.1: Support pushing energy to Tesla receivers.

1.9.4.1.0.0: Tesla API compatibility. Fix generators consuming buckets.
1.9.4.1.0.1: Support pushing energy to Tesla receivers.

1.9.0.12.0: Rework the structure assembly process to allow having blocks in the "holes". Fix dismantling structures when a structure block breaks. Fix structure block bounding boxes.
1.9.0.12.1: Protect TileEntities from calls to worldObj.getBlockState returning "air", during the tick when the block has been broken, but the TE is still being used by something else.
1.9.0.12.2: Fixed interacting with the rift browser in complex situations such as with the Storage Drawers.
1.9.0.13.0: Removed remaining IInventory uses. Fixed interface/browser scanning directions.
1.9.0.14.0: Change the browser gui interaction logic to be more like a chest (AE2-style).
1.9.0.14.2: Added logic to first try to fill existing inventories with the blocks they already contain, rather than always using the closest one.
1.9.0.15.0: Implemented a crafting browser. It works, but I haven't decided on the final recipe yet. Gave the rift blocks a better hardness value.
1.9.0.16.0: Rework the Browser GUI to perform sorting and searching on the client. This allows the feature to work with dedicated servers.
1.9.0.16.1: Avoid crashing if the inventory aggregator scans a half-loaded block.

1.8.9.0.12.2: Update checker support backported along with other improvements
1.8.9.0.13.0: Removed remaining IInventory uses. Fixed interface/browser scanning directions.
1.8.9.0.14.0: Change the browser gui interaction logic to be more like a chest (AE2-style).
1.8.9.0.14.2: Added logic to first try to fill existing inventories with the blocks they already contain, rather than always using the closest one.
1.8.9.0.15.0: Implemented a crafting browser. It works, but I haven't decided on the final recipe yet. Gave the rift blocks a better hardness value.
1.8.9.0.16.0: Rework the Browser GUI to perform sorting and searching on the client. This allows the feature to work with dedicated servers.
1.8.9.0.16.1: Avoid crashing if the inventory aggregator scans a half-loaded block.
